entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
